page.title: 14GAMES THAT WE PLAY
page.content: In our school we play many different sports.We have teams that compete in football and cricket,netball and rounders,athletics and swimming.We play against other schools.At playtime the girls play tennis and other ball games.They also have two hopscotch games painted on the yard and they enjoy playing on those.We also have circles painted on the yard where we can make up our own games.The boys enjoy playing British Bulldogs.In this game one person has to catch the other players.He can do this by chasing and touching them.When they are touched they must stand still.The game continues until all the players are caught.All the boys and girls enjoy playing chain touch.If it is wet at playtime we stay in our classrooms such as chess,draughts,cards and hangman. {Talycopa}
